menu.name: Classic Cheeseburger
menu.description: A timeless favorite with melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles.

menu.name: Bacon BBQ Burger
menu.description: A smoky delight with crispy bacon, tangy barbecue sauce, and caramelized onions.

menu.name: Spicy Jalapeno Burger
menu.description: For those who like it hot! Packed with fiery jalapenos and spicy mayo.

menu.name: Mushroom Swiss Burger
menu.description: A savory delight with saut√©ed mushrooms and melted Swiss cheese.

menu.name: Veggie Burger
menu.description: A vegetarian option with a flavorful vegetable patty and fresh toppings.

menu.name: French Fries
menu.description: Crispy golden fries served with ketchup.

menu.name: Onion Rings
menu.description: Crunchy breaded onion rings, perfect as a side or snack.

menu.name: Loaded Nachos
menu.description: Tortilla chips topped with melted cheese, jalapenos, salsa, and sour cream.

menu.name: Sweet Potato Fries
menu.description: Delicious sweet potato fries served with a tangy dipping sauce.

menu.name: Garlic Parmesan Wings
menu.description: Tender chicken wings coated in a flavorful garlic parmesan sauce.

menu.name: Classic Soda
menu.description: Refreshing carbonated soda available in various flavors.

menu.name: Iced Tea
menu.description: Chilled black or green tea served with or without lemon.

menu.name: Fruit Smoothie
menu.description: Blended mixture of fresh fruits, yogurt, and ice for a fruity and creamy delight.

menu.name: Milkshake
menu.description: Creamy milk-based drink with various flavors like chocolate, vanilla, or strawberry.

menu.name: Lemonade
menu.description: Refreshing citrus drink made with freshly squeezed lemons and sweetened with sugar.
